title: urgent font ID request !!
content:
I’m looking for the name of this font, or something very similar, (ie, a great hi-contrast serif font with contemporary flourishes).  
Many thanks in advance for any help !

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091130045720/http:/typophile.com/files/font_166.jpg) | 87.98 KB |
author: monna_g

comments.content:
I think [Mussica](http://web.archive.org/web/20091130045720/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/corradine/mussica/) might be something like you are describing, but the original sample is some sort of Antique Roman style. Sackers Antique Roman is similar, but with much lower x-height. I think I have seen that weird ’f’ before, but I can’t find it.

- Mike Yanega
